Package edu.cmu.cs.lti.discoursedb.core.model.macro

Contains POJOs with Hibernate 4 annotations to represent entities in the DiscourseDB Macro Layer

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Content
    Content entities represent the content of Contribution and Context entities.
    Contribution
    A Contribution entity is a representation of a contribution in a discussion space such as a forum post, chat message or equivalent discourse artifact.
    ContributionAudience  
    ContributionContext
    This relation entity associates a contribution c with another contribution or content that represents the context of c.
    Discourse
    A Discourse represents the broad context of interactions that might come from multiple datasets.
    DiscoursePart
    A DiscoursePart represents a distinct sub-space within a Discourse.
    DiscoursePartContribution  
    DiscoursePartRelation  
    DiscourseRelation  
    DiscourseToDiscoursePart  

Package edu.cmu.cs.lti.discoursedb.core.model.macro Description

Contains POJOs with Hibernate 4 annotations to represent entities in the DiscourseDB Macro Layer
